snippet: The move is intended to keep the spouses and children of top local officials from entering private business and profiting from their government connections.
abstract: Shanghai, battling corruption, issues strict regulations to keep families of top local officials from entering private business and profiting from their government connections.
lead_paragraph: The move is intended to keep the spouses and children of top local officials from entering private business and profiting from their government connections.

headline.main: Shanghai Enacts Curbs on Business Dealings of Officials’ Relatives
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: Fighting Graft, Shanghai Bars Officials’ Close Relatives From Business
